Member Function Documentation

- (void EC2IpPermission.)addUserIdGroupPair: (EC2UserIdGroupPair *)  userIdGroupPair  

Adds a single object to userIdGroupPairs.

This function will alloc and init userIdGroupPairs if not already done.

- (NSString * EC2IpPermission.)description  

Returns a string representation of this object; useful for testing and debugging.

Returns:
A string representation of this object.
- (id EC2IpPermission.)init  

Default constructor for a new object.

Callers should use the property methods to initialize this object after creating it.

Property Documentation

- (NSNumber *) fromPort [read, write, retain]

Start of port range for the TCP and UDP protocols, or an ICMP type number.

An ICMP type number of -1 indicates a wildcard (i.e., any ICMP type number).

- (NSString *) ipProtocol [read, write, retain]

The IP protocol of this permission.

Valid protocol values: tcp, udp, icmp

- (NSNumber *) toPort [read, write, retain]

End of port range for the TCP and UDP protocols, or an ICMP code.

An ICMP code of -1 indicates a wildcard (i.e., any ICMP code).
